quests.title: Workspace Sentinel
quests.description: Organize your workspace for 15 minutes to create a productive sanctuary. A clear space leads to a clear mind.
objectives: Clear clutter from your main work area
Create a system that makes sense to you
tips: Start with just your desk surface
Keep frequently used items within reach

quests.title: Financial Guardian
quests.description: Review and update your budget to protect your financial future. Knowledge is power, especially with money.
tips: Small regular reviews beat huge overhauls
Use whatever budgeting tool works for you

quests.title: Digital Fortress Keeper
quests.description: Back up important files and update security measures. Protect your digital realm from chaos.
objectives: Back up important files to cloud or external drive

quests.title: Tomorrow's Navigator
quests.description: Plan tomorrow's schedule and prepare for upcoming tasks. Future you will be grateful for the preparation.
objectives: Set 1-3 priority goals for the day
tips: Prepare clothes and materials the night before
Start with your most important task

quests.title: Declutter Champion
quests.description: Clear out 5 items you no longer need. Simplicity creates space for what matters most.
objectives: Find 5 items you no longer use
Actually remove them from your space
tips: The 'one year rule' - haven't used it? Let it go
Someone else might love what you don't need

quests.title: Emergency Preparedness Scout
quests.description: Check your emergency supplies and safety measures. A prepared guardian sleeps peacefully.
objectives: Test smoke detector batteries if needed
tips: Start with basics: water, flashlight, batteries
Peace of mind is worth the effort
